sqlMap.select: select item_code as "code", item_name as "name" from com_code where valid_flag = 'Y' and set_code = #setCode# order by seq

select cc.item_code as "code", cc.item_name as "name",
CASE t.$fieldName$ WHEN cc.item_code THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END as "checked" from COM_CODE cc, $tableName$ t where cc.valid_flag = 'Y' and cc.set_code='$setCode$' and t.$pkFieldName$ = #pkFieldValue#
'false' as "checked" from COM_CODE cc, dual t where cc.valid_flag = 'Y' and cc.set_code='$setCode$'
order by cc.seq
select PROVINCE_ID code, PROVINCE_NAME name from COM_PROVINCE
